title: 160+ Deeply Romantic Love Quotes for Her That Are Straight From The Heart

steps.title: Sweep her off her feet with a love quote that touches her heart.
steps.content: Sweep her off her feet with a love quote that touches her heart. Romance is often overlooked in relationships, but it needs to be a part of your everyday life. [1] X Research source Share one of these love quotes to express how you feel and dial up the romance in your relationship: “I wish you to know that you have been the last dream of my soul.” – Charles Dickens “If you remember me, then I don’t care if everyone else forgets.” – Haruki Murakami “I know by experience that the poets are right: love is eternal.” – E.M. Forster “If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.” – A.A. Milne “If I had to choose between breathing or loving you, I would say ‘I love you’ with my last breath.” – Shannon Dermott “If one day the moon calls you by your name don’t be surprised, because every night I tell her about you.” – Shahrazad al-Khalij “Each day I love you more, today more than yesterday and less than tomorrow.” Rosemonde Gerard “In case you ever foolishly forget: I am never not thinking of you.” – Virginia Woolf “I would rather spend one lifetime with you than face all the ages of the world alone.” – J.R.R. Tolkien “I love you the way a drowning man loves air. And it would destroy me to have you just a little.” – Rae Carson “If you find someone you love in your life, then hand on to that love.” – Princess Diana “She knew she loved him when ‘home’ went from being a place to being a person.” – E. Leventhal “I love you, not for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you.” – Roy Croft. “When I saw you I fell in love, and you smiled because you knew.” – Arrigo Boito “Every atom of your flesh is as dear to me as my own: in pain and sickness it would still be dear.” – Charlotte Brontë “My night has become a sunny dawn because of you.” – Ibn Abbad

steps.title: Bare your soul to her with a deep love quote.
steps.content: Bare your soul to her with a deep love quote. Communication is key to any relationship. But that doesn’t mean just talking about what to have for dinner. You have to be able to let her know what you’re feeling deep in your heart. [2] X Research source Try one of these deep love quotes to help her understand what you’re feeling: “Love is a quiet, reassuring, relaxing, pottering, pedantic, harmonious hum of a thing; something you can easily forget is there, even though its palms are outstretched beneath you in case you fall.” – Dolly Alderton “One day you will ask me which is more important—my life or yours? I will say mine and you will walk away not knowing that you are my life.” – Khalil Gibran “To be fully seen by somebody and then be loved anyhow—this is a human offering that can border on miraculous.” – Elizabeth Gilbert “Love is a gift of one’s innermost soul to another so both can be whole.” – Buddha “Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.” – Lao Tzu “Nobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold.” – Zelda Fitzgerald “Love is a fire. But whether it is going to warm your hearth or burn down your house, you can never tell.” – Joan Crawford “You don’t love someone because they’re perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they’re not.” – Jodi Picoult “Of all forms of caution, caution in love is perhaps the most fatal to true happiness.” – Bertrand Russell “When someone loves you, the way they talk about you is different. You feel safe and comfortable.” – Jess C. Scott “Love doesn’t grow at a steady rate, but advances in surges, bolts, and wild leaps.” – Ian McEwan “Love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.” – Antoine de Saint-Exupery “I swear I couldn’t love you more than I do right now, and yet I know I will tomorrow.” – Leo Christopher “I wish I could show you when you are lonely or in darkness the astonishing light of your own being.” – Hafiz of Shiraz “And I'd choose you; in a hundred lifetimes, in a hundred worlds, in any version of reality, I'd find you and I'd choose you.” – Kiersten White “The minute I heard my first love story I started looking for you, not knowing how blind that was. Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along.” – Rumi

steps.title: Turn up the heat with a sexy love quote.
steps.content: Turn up the heat with a sexy love quote. There’s nothing wrong with showing her your passionate side with a steamy quote. Not only is it a great way to set the mood, but it’s also fun to be a little bit naughty. So, add a little spice to your relationship with one of these red-hot love quotes: “When I’m good, I’m very good, but when I’m bad, I’m better.” – Mae West “A sea of whisky couldn’t intoxicate me as much as a drop of you.” – J.S. Parker “Let me paint your lips with the stars… so that I don’t need to go light-years each night to kiss them.” – Samba Shiva Thadavarthi “My soul made love to your soul long before our bodies met. When I first laid my eyes on you, I recognized you. You held my future in your hands.” – Anita Krizzan “I want you today, tomorrow, next week and for the rest of my life.” – I.A. Dice “Your hand touching mine. This is how galaxies collide.” – Sanober Khan “In your light, I learn how to love. In your beauty, how to make poems.” – Rumi “In true love it is the soul that envelops the body.” – Friedrich Nietzsche “You have bewitched me, body and soul.” – Jane Austen “Soul meets soul on lovers’ lips.” – Percy Bysshe Shelley “I love you as certain dark things are to be loved, in secret, between the shadow and the soul.” – Pablo Neruda “Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.” – Robert Frost

steps.title: Share a love quote that makes her feel all of her feelings.
steps.content: Share a love quote that makes her feel all of her feelings. Sharing one of your favorite quotes might help you tell her how you feel , but what happens if she doesn’t connect with it? When you share a quote, choose one that’s going to appeal to her tastes and feelings. Here are a few options of quotes she might love: “Love is the longing for the half of ourselves we have lost.” – Milan Kundera “Each time you happen to me all over again.” – Edith Wharton “Our love cannot be measured, it just is.” – John Paul Stevens “You are imperfect, permanently and inevitably flawed. And you are beautiful.” – Amy Bloom “The best and most beautiful things in this world cannot be seen or even heard, but must be felt with the heart.” – Helen Keller “When I look into your eyes, I know I have found the mirror of my soul.” – Joey W. Hill “A hundred hearts would be too few to carry all my love for you.” – Henry Wadsworth “Do I love you? My God, if your love were a grain of sand, mine would be a universe of beaches.” – William Goldman “I seem to have loved you in numberless forms, numberless times, in life after life, in age after age forever.” – Rabindranath Tagore “The only thing we never get enough of is love; and the only thing we never give enough of is love.” – Henry Miller “One word frees us of all the weight and pain of life: That word is love.” – Sophocles “And what do all the great words come to in the end, but that? I love you—I am at rest with you—I have come home.” – Dorothy L. Sayers “Love isn’t something you find. Love is something that finds you.” – Loretta Young “I loved her against reason, against promise, against peace, against hope, against happiness, against all discouragement that could be.” – Charles Dickens

steps.title: Show her you’re in her corner with an encouraging quote.
steps.content: Show her you’re in her corner with an encouraging quote. There’s more to love than the mushy stuff. Being there to encourage her is a wonderful way to show her you love her and want the very best for her. [3] X Research source Share one of these quotes to lift her up when she’s feeling down: “Love is an endless act of forgiveness. Forgiveness is the key to action and freedom.” – Hannah Arendt “Love is not about possession. Love is about appreciation.” – Osho “Love cures people—both the ones who give it and the ones who receive it.” – Karl Menninger “In love, one and one are one.” – Jean-Paul Sartre “Love must be as much a light as it is a flame.” – Henry David Thoreau “My love for you is past the mind, beyond my heart, and into my soul.” – Boris Kodjoe “We loved with a love that was more than love.” – Edgar Allan Poe “You are my heart, my life, my one and only thought.” – Arthur Conan Doyle “You have a place in my heart no one else could have.” – F. Scott Fitzgerald “But the you who you are tonight is the same you I was in love with yesterday, the same you I'll be in love with tomorrow.” – Gayle Forman “Love is a verb. Love—the feeling—is a fruit of love, the verb.” – Stephen Covey “Love is not only something you feel, it is something you do.” – David Wilkerson “I don’t cry because we’ve been separated by distance, and for a matter of years. Why? Because for as long as we share the same sky and breathe the same air, we’re still together.” – Donna Lynn Hope “The pain of parting is nothing to the joy of meeting again.” – Charles Dickens

steps.title: Remind her how adorable you are with a cute love quote.
steps.content: Remind her how adorable you are with a cute love quote. A cute quote is a good way to give her that warm fuzzy feeling. It’s also perfect for making her think of you and how much fun you have together. Try out of these cute-as-can-be quotes to brighten her day: “You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.” – Dr. Seuss “Your love shines in my heart as the sun that shines upon the earth.” – Eleanor Di Guillo “I'm not telling you it's going to be easy, I'm telling you it's going to be worth it.” – Art Williams “I love you more than coffee, but please don’t make me prove it.” – Elizabeth Evans “Love is like pi—natural, irrational, and very important.” – Lisa Hoffman “I look at you and I would rather look at you than all the portraits in the world.” – Frank O’Hara “I wonder how much of the day I spend just calling after you.” – Harper Lee “It was only a sunny smile, and little it cost in the giving, but like morning light it scattered the night and made the day worth living.” – F. Scott Fitzgerald “How lucky I am to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard.” – A.A. Milne “Why, darling, I don't live at all when I'm not with you.” – Ernest Hemingway “It’s always better when we’re together.” – Jack Johnson “Whatever it is that makes you the person you are—that’s what I love. All of it.” – Amy Vincent “I like you very much. Just as you are.” – Helen Fielding “I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once.” – John Green “To be your friend was all I ever wanted; to be your lover was all I ever dreamed.” – Valerie Lombardo “Stolen kisses are always sweetest.” – Leigh Hunt

steps.title: Send her a funny quote about love to make her laugh.
steps.content: Send her a funny quote about love to make her laugh. Laughter is good for your physical and mental health. It’s also a fun way to strengthen your bond and ease any conflicts. [4] X Trustworthy Source HelpGuide Nonprofit organization dedicated to providing free, evidence-based mental health and wellness resources. Go to source Give her a chuckle with one of these funny love quotes: “You are the finest, loveliest, tenderest, and most beautiful person I have ever known—and even that is an understatement.” – F. Scott Fitzgerald “I love you, and it’s getting worse.” – Joseph E. Morris “It wasn’t love at first sight. It took a full five minutes.” – Lucille Ball “A guy knows he's in love when he loses interest in his car for a couple of days.” – Tim Allen “Love is like an hourglass, with the heart filling up as the brain empties.” – Jules Renard “If love is the answer, could you please rephrase the question?” – Lily Tomlin “The heart has its reasons, of which reason knows nothing.” – Blaise Pascal “Love can change a person the way a parent can change a baby—awkwardly, and often with a great deal of mess.” – Lemony Snicket “Love is a lot like a backache: it doesn’t show up on X-rays, but you know it’s there.” – George Burns “Love conquers all things except poverty and toothache.” – Mae West “Romantic love is a mental illness. But it’s a pleasurable one.” – Fran Lebowitz “Love is being stupid together.” – Paul Valéry “I can't make you love me, but I can fill my pantry with your favorite snacks and offer you a weekly stipend of $75.” – Rob Delaney “If I loved you less, I might be able to talk about it more.” – Jane Austen “I love you. You annoy me more than I ever thought possible. But I want to spend every irritating minute with you.” – Iona Mink “Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love.” – Albert Einstein

steps.title: Say a lot with only a few words with a short love quote.
steps.content: Say a lot with only a few words with a short love quote. Sometimes, shorter quotes that get right to the point are more powerful than longer, more flowery quotes. These short love quotes are perfect when you want to keep it short and simple: “I remember who I am when I’m with you.” – Nicole Christie “Love makes your soul crawl out from its hiding place.” – Zora Neale Hurston “Love recognizes no barriers.” – Maya Angelou “Love is friendship on fire.” – Susan Sontag “There is no remedy for love but to love more.” – Henry David Thoreau “To live without loving is not really to live.” – Molière “Never above you. Never below you. Always beside you.” – Walter Winchell “Where there is love, there is life.” – Mahatma Gandhi “O tell her, brief is life but love is long.” – Alfred, Lord Tennyson “Love is a friendship set to music.” – Joseph Campbell “If I know what love is, it is because of you.” – Hermann Hesse “The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.” – Audrey Hepburn “We love because it’s the only true adventure.” – Nikki Giovanni

steps.title: Borrow the wit and wisdom of famous people to share your love.
steps.content: Borrow the wit and wisdom of famous people to share your love. Quotes from Shakespeare , Jane Austen, and F. Scott Fitzgerald (and more) all have beautiful and witty things to say about love. Here’s a list of some of the most meaningful love quotes ever: “…Two souls are sometimes created together and in love before they’re born.” – F. Scott Fitzgerald “Grow old along with me; the best is yet to be.” – Robert Browning “A loving heart is the truest wisdom.” – Charles Dickens “In love there are two things—bodies and words.” – Joyce Carol Oates “I have no notion of loving people by halves; it is not my nature.” – Jane Austen “We are most alive when we are in love.” – John Updike “There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved. – George Sand “I love you with so much of my heart that none is left to protest.” – William Shakespeare “Have enough courage to trust love one more time and always one more time.” – Maya Angelou “The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.” – Victor Hugo ”How do I love thee? Let me count the ways. I love thee to the depth and breadth and height My soul can reach.” – Elizabeth Barrett Browning “In vain have I struggled. It will not do. My feelings will not be repressed. You must allow me to tell you how ardently I admire and love you.” – Jane Austen ”Women are meant to be loved, not to be understood.” – Oscar Wilde “Shall I compare thee to a summer’s day? Thou art more lovely and more temperate.” – William Shakespeare

steps.title: Turn to love songs to share a heart-touching quote with her.
steps.content: Turn to love songs to share a heart-touching quote with her. What better place to get a sweet quote than a love song? Even better if that song is one of her favorites. But if you don’t know what she’s listening to right now, here are a few devastatingly romantic quotes from love songs: “And woman, hold me close to your heart. However distant, don't keep us apart. After all, it is written in the stars.” – John Lennon, “Woman” “I'm gonna love you like I've never been hurt before. I'm gonna love you like I'm indestructible.” – Robyn, “Indestructible” “No matter where I go, I hear the beating of your heart.” – Cyndi Lauper, “I Drove All Night” “My love is the evenin' breeze touchin' your skin, the gentle, sweet singin' of leaves in the wind.” – Heart, “Crazy on You” “All the promises we make from the cradle to the grave when all I want is you.” U2, “All I Want Is You” “When I’m lying wrapped up in your arms, the whole world just fades away.” – Faith Hill, “Breathe” “You're still the one I run to. The one that I belong to. You're still the one I want for life.” – Shania Twain, “You’re Still the One” “And here we are in heaven, for you are mine at last.” – Etta James, “At Last” “Can't live if living is without you.” – Harry Nilsson, “Without You” “I may not always love you, but as long as there are stars above you, you never need to doubt it. I’ll make you so sure about it.” – The Beach Boys, “God Only Knows” “Oh I do wish you joy. And I wish you happiness. But above all this, I wish you love.” – Dolly Parton, “I Will Always Love You” “The taste of love is sweet when hearts like ours meet.” – Johnny Cash, “Ring of Fire” “And every time I see you, I tell myself I'll never have this feeling with another. Oh, you're in my heart forever.” – Angel Olsen, “Give It Up” “I need you, darling, like the fish needs the sea.” – Janis Joplin, “Call on Me” “I hope you don’t mind that I put down in words how wonderful life is while you’re in the world.” – Elton John, “Your Song” “You fill up my senses, like a night in the forest, like the mountains in springtime, like a walk in the rain, like a storm in the desert, like a sleepy blue ocean. You fill up my senses. Come fill me again.” – John Denver, “Annie’s Song” “When a man loves a woman, can't keep his mind on nothin' else.” – Percy Sledge, “When a Man Loves a Woman”

steps.title: Reach out during the day with a sweet text message.
steps.content: Reach out during the day with a sweet text message. Sometimes, you want to shoot off a quick text message to tell her you love her without worrying about who said it first. Here are a few text-ready message to help you express your feelings: You hold the key to my heart. 🗝️❤️ You complete me. Just thinking about how your laugh is probably my favorite sound. Loving you is the best part of my day. 😘 Except for when I’m sleeping, I’m always thinking about you. You’re my heart’s desire, my angel. My love for you knows no bounds. ♥️🌍♥️ Every day, hour, minute, and second, I’m thinking about you. I love you from the bottom of my soul, my sweet princess. 👑 You’re always the first person I want to go to when I have good news. Forget the butterflies… I feel the whole zoo when I’m with you! 🐻🐼🐨🐯 Just the thought of you is enough to make me blush. I’m obsessed with you. But like, in a cute way. Totally not creepy. If Van Gogh had you for a model, the sunflowers would have gone in the trash. 🌻🌻🌻 Couldn’t help but think about how pretty your smile is. You’re my sun ☀️, moon 🌙, and all the stars 💫. I love you with all my heart. Suddenly thinking about how sweet and kind you are. To honor your beauty and kindness, I present you with a dozen red roses. 🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹🌹

steps.title: Write your love message on cute stationary.
steps.content: Write your love message on cute stationary. When you write a love note , what you say in your note is the most important part. Technically, it can be on an old receipt if that’s what you have. However, putting it on nice stationary or a special note card is a thoughtful touch. Or try getting a little creative with one of these ideas: Sticky notes come in all different sizes and colors. And you can stick them anywhere! Write your note out on a napkin or paper towel and put it in her lunch bag. That way, she’ll have a nice surprise at lunch time. Write it out on a postcard and send it to her through snail mail. It might take a day or so, but getting a sweet note is way better than bills or junk mail! If she’s a reader, get a paper bookmark and write your note on the back. Then, slip it into the book she’s reading.

steps.title: Tell her what you love about her.
steps.content: Tell her what you love about her. “I would definitely start by writing about what you love about your partner and why,” suggests Beck. Make a list of everything you love about her. Then, use that as inspiration for your note. “Describe the qualities that make them special to you… the qualities that actually touch your heart… It can even be quirky, cute things about them,” explains Beck. Another option is to make a list of your feelings and let that be in your note. Elizabeth Barrett Browning took this approach and created one of the most famous love poems of all time.

steps.title: Let her know how she’s changed your life.
steps.content: Let her know how she’s changed your life. “Definitely tell them what they mean to you. And how their love has changed your life for the better,” Beck recommends. Think about what your life was like before you met her and how it’s different now. Do you laugh and smile more? Are you happier than you’ve ever been? Are you inspired to try new things? Tell her about it! According to Beck, it’s a good idea to “share one of your favorite memories with them. Or maybe a very simple moment that really touched your heart, but you never told them.” One example would be to say something like, “One day when we were eating ice cream, you didn’t notice you got some on your nose. I just knew. You’re the one for me.”

steps.title: Put your message where she’ll find it.
steps.content: Put your message where she’ll find it. You can tuck your note in a card and hand it directly to her. That’s a perfectly acceptable approach that won’t take away from the feelings you share. However, leaving the note somewhere for her to find gives her a delightful surprise as she goes about her day. Think about her routine and place the note where she’s sure to see it. Put the note on her bathroom mirror where she’ll see it first thing in the morning. If you have a set of keys to her car, place it on her seat where she’ll find it when she goes to work.
